m_szDocTitle: OilVoice | BP study sees technology boosting energy supplies and providing path to lower carbon future
m_szDocSumamry: BP study sees technology boosting energy supplies and providing path to lower carbon future Monday, November 2, 2015         BP Technology Outlook predicts secure and sustainable energy future through application of existing and new technologies Advances in technology will keep energy supplies plentiful and affordable - enough to meet projected demand many times over -- and help pave the way to a lower carbon energy mix, according to data published today in the BP Technology Outlook. 'Technology opens up a whole range of possibilities across the energy sector,' said Bob Dudley, BP Group Chief
